title: Phone freezing up randomly in all apps. Cannot make or receive calls . Cannot record sounds with videos. Cannot play audiobooks. Cannot use headset (s). Cannot use fingerprint scanner. I have deleted SO many apps and pictures and i have freed up lots of space. I have all the same issues in Safe Mode
content: I have freed up over 20% of memory. I have restarted phone in safe mode. I have deleted many apps. I have cleared my internet browsing history/cookies. I am at a loss. My phone can text and THATS ALL IT DOES FOR ME
